评论概述: Hesitant at first, ended up being my favorite jacket🤟
评论详情: I was skeptical at first buying a varsity jacket off Amazon, but this ended up being one of the only jackets I wear now. It is so comfortable, and the inside lining makes it so that it’s not suffocating me in heat like most varsity jackets do, but thick enough to keep me from freezing my butt off. Goes with anything since it’s a black and white jacket and I get so many compliments in class. Might get other colors of it now lol. 10/10 for the money and it’s true to size, I’m 5’11 and 75 kg
